name: 1502 - Cachitos - Robusto
additionalNotes: 1502 Cachitos cigars are produced by master blender Enrique Sánchez and rolled at the famous Plasencia factory in Nicaragua, home to many of the world’s most popular blends. The cigar is available in just one 4 x 50 classic Rothschild that features a stunning, dark, oily, Nicaraguan Habano wrapper and a tasty Honduran binder, followed by long filler tobacco from Nicaragua and Honduras. Medium bodied, extremely well-made, and oozing with complex tasting notes of chocolate, coffee, leather, pepper, and wood.
